TopicTitle: Is it allowed to distribute retextures, if they where edited from stock .mbm's?

Articles.Content:
Hello! I've been creating my own retextures of the stock parts and I've been wondering if I'll be allowed to distribute them. I've been converting and editing the stock .mbm texture files and I'm not sure if it is allowed to distribute them again.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

- Avera9eJoe

I'll probably download this whenever you finish it, looks good! I want to see your take on the 2.5m tanks.
